column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The wait staff was slow
column2: the drinks were fine and were the only saving grace
column3: and our waiter forgot one of the orders
column6: and even though the drinks were fine
column7: they still took forever to make. My dad ordered none of the fancy cocktails (gin and tonic) and you would have thought they had to go out to purchase the gin. All in all
column8: we won't be returning. Poor service for the price and nothing that stands out to make me say
